name: Sumit Pande
title: Full-Stack Developer crafting scalable, high-performance web applications. Experienced with React, Vue, TypeScript, Node, and modern UI engineering.
summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience in full-stack web development using JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and Java. Skilled in building scalable applications with React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Django, REST APIs, and microservice-based architectures. Strong expertise in component-based UI development, state management, database design (SQL, MongoDB), and cloud-ready deployment with Docker. Proven ability to work in Agile teams, optimize performance, translate business requirements into technical solutions, and deliver high-quality, production-ready software. Passionate about modern frameworks, system design, and end-to-end product development.

data.title: Software Engineering Specialist
description: Developed and maintained web applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js, enhancing user experience and performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement RESTful APIs, improving data exchange efficiency by 30%.
Led code reviews and mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the team.
Optimized application performance through code refactoring and implementing best practices, resulting in a 25% reduction in load times.

data.name: SocialX
description: Developed SocialX, a full-stack real-time social media platform focused on seamless communication and high user engagement.
Built instant messaging with Socket.io and peer-to-peer video calling using WebRTC, enabling low-latency live interactions.
Implemented dynamic notifications, real-time post interactions, and a robust user profile system for enhanced social features.
Designed a scalable Node.js + MongoDB backend, ensuring fast performance and a responsive user experience.
